prodNameC: 凡立沙抗核抗體結締組織疾病篩檢試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Microplate Strips
coated with nuclear antigens: dsDNA, U1RNP (RNP70, A, C), Sm(B, B’, D), SS-A/Ro(52 kDa, 60kDa), SS-B/La, Scl-70, CENP-B, Histone, PM-Scl, Ribosomal P Protein and Jo-1, foil pouch contains desiccant
Calibrator
1 vial of buffer containing BSA, 0.095% (w/v) sodium azide, detergent and human serum, 1.5 ml,
Negative Control
1 vial of buffer containing BSA, 0.095% (w/v) sodium azide, detergent and human serum, 1.5 ml,
Positive Control
1 vial of buffer containing BSA, 0.095% (w/v) sodium azide, detergent and human serum positive for CTD antibodies, 1.5 ml,
Wash Buffer AF Concentrate
1 vial of 20x PBS concentrate containing detergent, 75 ml
Sample Diluent
1 vial of PBS containing BSA, 0.095% (w/v) sodium azide and detergent, 100 ml,
IgG HRP Conjugate
1 vial of anti-human IgG HRP (horse-radish peroxidase) conjugate, 20 ml,
Substrate TMB 30’
1 vial of TMB (3, 3’, 5, 5’ Tetramethylbenzidine), 20 ml,
Stop Solution
1 vial of 0.5 M H2SO4, 20 ml,
applicantName: 台灣法迪亞股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市內湖區洲子街85號6樓之1
efficacy: 用來進行人體血清或血漿中10種抗核抗體的定性分析。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5100 抗核抗體免疫試驗系統
